column4: has anyone been able to play online poker in Ubuntu? I can only find windows software.
i dont do poker, but have you tested running those apps on Wine?
they depend heavily on IE, it seems. I've installed ies4linux, but that doesn't seem to help any at all.
thats because ies4linux goes into its own wine folder
you could try viewing AppDb entry on Internet Explorer at winehq.org
no, that still results in only the index.html file being downloaded. The manpage also sais --mirror covers -r.
seems like it's because the site is moved permanently to www.djangoproject.com
please set your --wait, would suck for the server if you didn't
